pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū veṭhitasīsassa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.3: “Na veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk66:1.7: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca veṭhitasīsassa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
